alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Norton and east central Decatur Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Hendley to 4 miles east of Norcatur to 4 miles northwest of Jennings. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Clayton around 530 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Norton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
